segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, I'm surprised he hasn't fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I'm getting nervous just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to trust him completely, just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they must do this often, sneaking cookies when the woman isn't looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to have a system, with the boy climbing and the girl waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll share the cookies or if the boy will keep them all for himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so distracted, she hasn't even noticed them yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, it's kind of fun to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is almost there, just a little more stretch and he'll have those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
